ComicInfo.Title: That Dracula May Live Again!; Vampires Drink Deep!; The Terror That Stalked Castle Dracula!; One Corpse... One Vote!; The Voodoo Queen of New Orleans!
ComicInfo.Summary:
A business man attempts to swindle a coven of vampires by draining their blood every day and selling it back to them every evening.
Marie Laveau's henchman steals Dracula's coffin, with Dracula inside, in New York and transports him to New Orleans to obtain vampire blood to complete a voodoo ritual.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-15 19:15:15. [CVDB13628] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:54:25. [Issue ID 26700]
